content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema'>      <!--         Airmet schema              This is a schema that describes the correct form that an xml document          must conform to in order to be correctly transformed by the          airmet_tango.xsl stylesheet.               The schema defines two types of elements, a hdr and smear.  The hdr          contains information that is applied to all elements and cannot be          derived from any of the GFA elements in the vg file.  The smear element          contains information that is taken from smear elements found in the          originating vg file.              Log:         E. Safford/SAIC    11/04    initial coding         E. Safford/SAIC    01/05    add IFR and allow for multiple sigmet                  references per smear         E. Safford/SAIC    11/05    add outlooks, add lat/lon info necessary for                                                      the From line display         E. Safford/SAIC    12/05    add freezingRange, split up Base & Top in smearType         E. Safford/SAIC    01/06    add Level, include FZLVL in enumerated hazard types         E. Safford/SAIC    04/06    add conditions begin/end information         E. Safford/SAIC    05/06    add FzlBase and FzlTop                B. Yin/SAIC    07/07    add airmetTag     -->          <xs:element name="gfaInfo">         <xs:complexType>             <xs:sequence>                 <xs:element name="hdr" type="hdrType"/>  <!-- must have 1 per file -->                 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">                     <xs:element name="smear" type="smearType"/>                     <xs:element name="outlook" type="smearType"/>                 </xs:choice>                 <xs:element name="freezingRange" type="freezingRangeType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             </xs:sequence>         </xs:complexType>     </xs:element>               <!--          header element type definition     -->     <xs:complexType name="hdrType">                     <xs:all>             <xs:element name="faArea" type="faAreaType"/>             <xs:element name="issueTime" type="timeType"/>             <xs:element name="untilTime" type="timeType"/>             <xs:element name="outlookEndTime" type="timeType"></xs:element>         </xs:all>     </xs:complexType>          <!--           hdrType component types      -->     <xs:simpleType name="faAreaType">         <xs:restriction base="xs:string">             <xs:length value="3"/>         </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>          <xs:simpleType name="timeType">         <xs:restriction base="xs:positiveInteger">             <xs:totalDigits value="6"/>         </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>          <xs:simpleType name="hazardWordingType">         <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/>     </xs:simpleType>                   <!--       smearType definition     -->     <xs:complexType name="smearType">         <xs:sequence>             <xs:element name="ReferToSigmet" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="hazard" type="hazardType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="stateList" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="closeFlg" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="nLatLonPts" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="latPts" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="lonPts" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="fromLine" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="Frequency" type="frequencyType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="Severity" type="severityType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="Top" type="BaseTopType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="Base" type="BaseTopType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="FzlTop" type="BaseTopType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="FzlBase" type="BaseTopType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="Level" type="BaseTopType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="DUE_TO" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="Status" type="statusType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>              <xs:element name="updateNum" type="updateType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="fromCondsDvlpg" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="fromCondsEndg" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="genOlk" type="genOlkType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="condsContg" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="otlkCondsDvlpg" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="otlkCondsEndg" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>             <xs:element name="airmetTag" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/>         </xs:sequence>     </xs:complexType>          <!--          smear component types      -->     <xs:simpleType name="hazardType">         <xs:restriction base="xs:string">             <xs:enumeration value="TURB"/>             <xs:enumeration value="turb"/>             <xs:enumeration value="ICE"/>             <xs:enumeration value="ice"/>             <xs:enumeration value="MT_OBSC"/>             <xs:enumeration value="mt_obsc"/>             <xs:enumeration value="LLWS"/>             <xs:enumeration value="llws"/>             <xs:enumeration value="SFC_WND"/>             <xs:enumeration value="sfc_wnd"/>             <xs:enumeration value="IFR"/>             <xs:enumeration value="ifr"/>             <xs:enumeration value="M_FZLVL"/>             <xs:enumeration value="m_fzlvl"/>             <xs:enumeration value="FZLVL"/>             <xs:enumeration value="fzlvl"/>         </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>          <xs:simpleType name="updateType">         <xs:restriction base="xs:positiveInteger">             <xs:totalDigits value="1"/>         </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>          <xs:simpleType name="frequencyType">         <xs:restriction base="xs:string">             <xs:enumeration value="OCNL"/>             <xs:enumeration value="ocnl"/>             <xs:enumeration value="FRQ"/>             <xs:enumeration value="frq"/>             <xs:enumeration value="NO QUALIFIER"/>             <xs:enumeration value="No Qualifier"/>             <xs:enumeration value="no qualifier"/>             <xs:enumeration value=""/>         </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>          <xs:simpleType name="severityType">         <xs:restriction base="xs:string">             <xs:enumeration value="MOD"/>             <xs:enumeration value="mod"/>             <xs:enumeration value="SEV"/>             <xs:enumeration value="sev"/>             <xs:enumeration value=""/>         </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>          <xs:simpleType name="statusType">         <xs:restriction base="xs:string">             <xs:enumeration value="NRML"/>             <xs:enumeration value="COR"/>             <xs:enumeration value="AMD"/>             <xs:enumeration value="CAN"/>             <xs:enumeration value="NEW"/>         </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>          <!--           freezing range and component types     -->     <xs:complexType name="freezingRangeType">                     <xs:all>             <xs:element name="Top" type="BaseTopType"/>             <xs:element name="Base" type="BaseTopType"/>         </xs:all>     </xs:complexType>               <xs:simpleType name="BaseTopType">         <xs:restriction base="xs:string">             <xs:maxLength value="3"/>         </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>      <!--          generate outlook type     -->     <xs:simpleType name="genOlkType">         <xs:restriction base="xs:string">             <xs:enumeration value="YES"/>             <xs:enumeration value="NO"/>             <xs:enumeration value="MAYBE"/>             <xs:enumeration value="NULL"/>         </xs:restriction>     </xs:simpleType>      </xs:schema>
